translation.en: WOMAN ON PA: Welcome to Wichita Mid-Continent Airport.

That bag is wicked heavy, anyhow.
I was looking at my phone. I hate it when people do that.

translation.en: You have a little
smudge.
What are these?

I restore old cars, so...
Hair-dryer. (LAUGHS)
(EXCLAIMS) Oh, my God, I'm so sorry.
This is getting to be a habit.

translation.en: Sorry about that.
Thank you. Yeah, sure.
Boston?
Gate 12.
Enjoy your flight, Mr. Garcia. Thank you. Hi.
I'm sorry. You're not on this flight.
Well, I just checked in for this one, like, 10 minutes ago.

I'm sorry, the computer shows that we're booked.
Listen, Sharry.
Tomorrow my little sister's getting married.

translation.en: She's April, I'm June,
translation.ja: 私が親代わりで育てた 妹なのよ 妹の名はエイプリル 私はジューン

translation.en: she's counting on me to march her down the aisle tomorrow.

translation.en: That's very sweet,
translation.ja: 今夜 11時50分の便でも 間に合いますよ

translation.en: but the 11:50 will get you there tomorrow morning with plenty of time.

translation.en: Your boarding pass, sir?
Sometimes things happen for a reason.

translation.en: Enjoy your flight, Mr. Miller. Thank you.
WOMAN ON PA: This is the final boarding call for US Midland Air, flight 77

translation.ja: ボストン行き 77便の 最終搭乗案内です 12番ゲートより搭乗中 お急ぎ下さい

translation.en: Would all passengers holding a valid boarding pass, please proceed...
translation.ja: 12番ゲートより搭乗中 お急ぎ下さい

translation.en: It doesn't mean capping a dozen people

translation.en: in a government lab and blowing it up.
translation.ja: 大勢 殺して 政府のラボを爆破し―

translation.en: It doesn't mean stealing an object of critical importance.

translation.en: Does he have the Zephyr or not? We believe so.

translation.en: Uh-huh. You believe so.
(WHISPERING) Check it out. I don't care what you believe, Fitz.

translation.en: I need you to clean your mess up. Go back and play it again.

translation.en: I want the Zephyr.
We'll have it in hand by the time he lands in Boston.

translation.en: Find out who and what she is.
Should I have the field office pick her up in Wichita?

translation.en: Umm-mmm. I got a better idea.
Miss Havens? We did find a seat for you.
(LOUIE LOUIE RINGTONE PLAYING)
MALE ATTENDANT ON PA: I'd like to have your attention, please. We apologize for the delay.

translation.en: We will be departing Wichita Airport shortly.
translation.ja: 出発が遅れて 申し訳ありません “動きあり”

translation.en: Fitz. What did you do?

translation.en: It's no wonder these airlines are going out of business.
translation.ja: 航空会社が つぶれるのも 当然ね

translation.en: There's nobody on the plane.
MALE ATTENDANT: The captain has turned on the "fasten seatbelt" sign.
Please remain seated until the sign has been turned off and it's safe to move about the cabin.

translation.en: I'm June, by the way.
I'm Roy Miller.
Nice to meet you.
It's very nice to meet you.
STEWARDESS: Tequila on the rocks?
Yeah. Just in time, thanks.
So, your sister's getting married tomorrow?
translation.ja: 明日 妹さんが結婚？

translation.en: Excuse me? Your sister.
She's getting married tomorrow. Congratulations.

translation.en: Oh. Yeah, thanks.
You know, Roy, I'm a bad liar.

translation.en: I'm sorry, how's that?
April is getting married, but not till Saturday.

translation.en: You had me fooled.
Well, I do have a fitting tomorrow.

translation.en: So, I do, actually, have to go home.

translation.en: I hope this isn't gonna be a rough flight.

translation.en: (MUTTERING) It might be.
Wichita is a long way to go for a carburetor.

translation.en: It's not just any carburetor. It's a triple deuce.
Oh. I'm restoring a '66 GTO. And Kansas has the best scrap.

translation.en: Really?
My dad had a garage, and when I was a kid, he bought this chassis.
translation.ja: 車の修理工だった父は ＧＴＯのシャーシを買い―

translation.en: He used to take us to yards, and search for parts, you know?
translation.ja: 小さかった私を連れ パーツ探しをした

translation.en: He died in '98,
and now that April's getting married, I just figured, why not finish it up,
translation.ja: 結婚する妹のため その車を完成させ―

translation.en: give it to her sort of as a wedding present?
Kind of like a present from our dad, too, you know?
That's nice.
I used to think that (SIGHS)
someday, when the last part went in,
translation.ja: いつか 最後の パーツを取りつけ―

translation.en: I would just climb into that GTO and start it up.
translation.ja: ＧＴＯで旅に出たいと 思ってるの

translation.en: Just drive and drive and drive, and just keep driving

translation.en: until I got to the tip of South America.

translation.en: Cape Horn. Yeah.
translation.ja: ケープ･ホーン そう

translation.en: There's beautiful islands down there.
Pirate islands. (LAUGHS)
Yeah, "someday." That's a dangerous word.
Dangerous?
It's really just code for "never."
I think a lot about things I haven't done.

translation.en: Dive in the Great Barrier Reef.

translation.en: Ride the Orient Express.

translation.en: Live on the Amalfi Coast with nothing but a motorcycle and a backpack.

translation.en: Kiss a stranger on the balcony of the Hotel Du Cap.

translation.en: Where is that?
South of France.
What about you? What's your list?
Well, yours sounds pretty good.

translation.en: Thanks.
It's no problem.
I'll just put this up here, if that's all right.

translation.en: You know what?
I'm gonna go back and use the restroom.

I'll be out in a minute. Sure.
"Kiss a stranger on the balcony of the Hotel Du Cap"?

I mean, it's, like, a really good line.

translation.en: Lightning-fast reflexes.
Not cool.
Okay.
This will help.
Ocupado.
Enough. It's over, Roy.
Yeah, I agree. Enough.

Don't move, Miller.
So what are you gonna do? What are you gonna do?

I'm sorry. I...
No, no, don't... It's great. I'm sorry.

What? Oh, my God, you're in a relationship. I'm so sorry.

No, not yet. Uh...
No?
Listen, there's no need to panic. I have...

translation.en: contained the situation.
Situation?
Yeah. We've lost the pilots.

translation.en: Where did they go?
I mean, they're dead.
The pilots are dead. Shot. It's...
Shot?
By who?
Well, me.
Actually, I shot the first pilot.
He shot the second pilot accidentally. It's just
translation.ja: そいつの弾が ２人目に当たり…

translation.en: one of those things.
Seriously, this is great!

translation.en: Really, I'm relieved you are taking this so well.

I'm just gonna go check on things and think about landing.

translation.en: This is weird.
What's happening? Everybody's dead out there!

Everybody's dead in here. MILLER: I'm declaring an emergency.

Are we going down?
No, June, it's just a rapid descent. Please, sit down.

translation.en: The shoulder straps.
You can put those over, and it clicks in right down there.

translation.en: You wanna click it right there, that's it.
Okay, I got it, I got it. Okay...

Why can't we just land in an airport?
No, no, that wouldn't be a good idea. They'll be waiting for us.

translation.en: I think the less you know, the better.
MILLER: Okay, we're gonna touch down here.

translation.en: That's a truck. That's a truck! Yeah.
That's a truck! Yup.

That's a curve. That's a curve! I see it. I see it.

JUNE: What's good?
Take a sip of that.
It'll take the edge off.
Are you shot?
Yeah, how about that?
It's just a scrape. That's good news.

translation.en: June, we have to
discuss what's gonna happen next.

translation.en: You know, I feel a little weird.
Yeah, that'll pass once you fall asleep, which should be in a couple of minutes.

Did you drug me?
Yes.
You drugged me.
Yeah, it's for your own good.
Now, look. These bad people who are going to come and see you, they're gonna ask you about me. Okay?

June? June? Okay.

And you need to avoid getting in any vehicle with them at all costs.

translation.en: Well, they're serious people, June.
They'll probably identify themselves as federal agents, and they'll DIP you.

Dis-Information Protocol. They'll tell you a story about me. About how I'm mentally unstable, paranoid.

translation.en: How I'm violent and dangerous, and it'll all sound very convincing.

translation.en: I'm already convinced.
There's a few common DIP keywords to listen for.
translation.ja: 危険を察知するキーワードが

translation.en: Reassuring words. Words like, "stabilize," "secure," "safe."
translation.ja: “安心･保証･安全”と 奴らが何度も言ったら―

translation.en: If they say these words, particularly with repetition...
translation.ja: “安心･保証･安全”と 奴らが何度も言ったら― 油断してはいけない

translation.en: Okay.
...it means they're going to kill you.
Oh, God!

translation.en: Or intern you somewhere offshore for a very long time.

translation.en: Now, stay with me. If they tell you you're safe...

translation.en: If they tell me I'm safe,
they're gonna kill me.
Don't get in what?
Vehicles.
Any vehicles. Okay, any vehicles.

translation.en: Just run. I'll run.

translation.en: I don't know you. I don't know you at all.

translation.en: Who are you, Roy?
good for ski country, but probably... MAN ON TV: Thanks, Andrea. You're welcome.
MOSS: According to FAA sources, at approximately 7:30 last night,

translation.en: all contact was lost with a Boston-bound commuter jet from Wichita.
translation.ja: ボストン行きが 消息を絶ちました

translation.en: The plane was passing through turbulence
and may have met up with wind shear or a lightning storm. (POUNDING ON DOOR)

translation.en: Now, this is all conjecture at this point, as all that's left is a crater in an Indiana cornfield.

translation.en: Coming!
Rodney?
Oh! Thank God. I wanted to make sure you were okay.

translation.en: Yeah, why?
translation.ja: 無事か　よかった 心配してたんだ なんで？

translation.en: You were on that flight from Kansas, right?
Yeah. I saw on the news about the crash.
What news? What crash?
Anyway, you're alive.

translation.en: I'm alive, yeah.
Sure, that's cool. Hey, but, June, you know...
translation.ja: よかった ジューン　俺は… 決めてたんだ 君が生きてたら―

translation.en: I told myself that if I found you alive,
translation.ja: 決めてたんだ 君が生きてたら―

translation.en: that I was gonna ask you to dinner.
How about I call you later, okay?
JUNE: It's just another day. It's just a normal day. Okay.
translation.ja: 何も起きない 今日も普通の日よ

translation.en: She's moving.
APRIL: Wow!
And gotta love the boots.
translation.ja: でも それにブーツ？

translation.en: Yeah, you know.
I promise I'll wear heels on the day.
Hey. Can I talk to you for a second? Yeah.
So, this weekend, I was thinking about Dad's GTO.

translation.en: Really?
Yeah, it's just sitting there.

translation.en: And I was wondering how you would feel about maybe selling it.

Ben and I, we really want our own place.

translation.en: Excuse me?
Excuse me. Anyone here belong to that blue truck parked outside?

translation.en: Yeah, why?
You're about to get a ticket.
Thought I put enough quarters in there. Yeah.
I hate getting tickets.
Ooh! Excuse me.
Please step inside, miss.
Uh... Let me just go grab a few things.
Miss Havens, good afternoon. Special Agent-in-Charge, Fitzgerald.

translation.en: Who are you again?
FBI. You do know Mr. Miller.

Well, we chatted a little bit before security, but...

translation.en: I see. And once you were on the flight,

He said that you'd say he was crazy.

translation.en: No. No, not you, specifically.

Simon Feck?
I don't know who that is.

translation.en: Someplace safe.
With you? Yes, ma'am.

Fellas? Don't worry, miss, you're safe.

You're safe with us.
I wanna know where we're going.
Just a shortcut till the situation is stabilized.
We'll keep you safe. (TIRES SCREECHING)
You said that already. Because I meant it.

translation.en: AGENT: What is Jackson doing?
Shooter! Shooter! Evade! Evade! Shooter on the freeway.

translation.en: The dot's on your back!
Follow me, now!
Are you insane? I'm not going out that door!
(SCREAMING) Oh, my God!
Get your foot off...
Oh, my God! Hey, June!
I can't see! You are doing great.
I can't see! Get out of the way!
Open the door.
translation.ja: どいて！ ドアを開けろ　開けるんだ

translation.en: I can't get his foot off the gas. Open the door, June.
translation.ja: ドアを開けろ　開けるんだ 開けろ ステキなドレスだ

translation.en: Open the door, June. That's a beautiful dress, by the way.
translation.ja: 開けろ ステキなドレスだ

translation.en: (SCREAMING) One second.
Thank you.
Who are you?
What are you doing?
Hi, June. Move out of the way, I can't see!
translation.ja: ジューン 邪魔！　見えない

translation.en: Please unlock the door, June.
Unlock the door. That way, I can help you.
translation.ja: 開ければ― 助けられる

translation.en: I can't let go! You need to let go, June.
June, door! Got it!
translation.ja: ジューン　ドア！ 開けた！

translation.en: Just pull over! Oh, my God!
Come on. Come on. Come on. Yup, come over here.
translation.ja: おいで 降りて こっちへ

translation.en: Right over here. Just stay down, you're doing good.
translation.ja: ここに しゃがんで

translation.en: Here, hold this. Well, well, well.
Check this out.
Nice.
These guys are loaded for bear.
You're doing well, June.
Excellent driving. Over a dead guy, no less.
translation.ja: 運転が うまい 死体越しなのに

translation.en: You're a natural.
That's a beautiful dress.
Is that for April's wedding? Uh-huh.
Saturday? Yeah.
Yeah, that will be nice. Yeah.
(GASPING) Please, stop shooting people, okay?
translation.ja: お願い 人を撃つのは やめて

translation.en: Just stop shooting people.
I understand.
You're in shock.
How about you stay here
translation.ja: 君は ここで待ってろ

translation.en: while I go have a word with the guys in the tunnel. Okay? Okay.
translation.ja: 僕は あいつらと 話をつけてくる

translation.en: Okay? Okay.
Actually, I'm just gonna go shoot them. I'll be right back.
translation.ja: 少し撃つけど すぐ戻る

translation.en: By the way, your timing when you opened that door... Okay. ...was sublime.
translation.ja: ドアを開けたタイミングは 絶妙だった

translation.en: You saved us, I hope you know that. You saved us. Okay.
translation.ja: 君の おかげで 助かったんだよ

translation.en: Hey, wait!
Wait! Wait! Wait!
There you are.
MILLER: June?
June?
Rodney?
What are you doing here?
Whoa! That's a... Hey, guys, say hello to June.
translation.ja: みんな　ジューンだ

translation.en: That's a dress.
Everything all right? Yeah.
No, it's...
It's complicated.
You know what? I've been feeling the same way.
You wanna talk? Maybe over some pie?
translation.ja: 話をする？ パイを食べながら

translation.en: My point is...
My point is, that plane crash made me think about our break-up. You know, this bulb went off, bing!
translation.ja: 墜落のニュースで 君との別れを後悔した

translation.en: "Rodney, why are you giving up? You're being passive."
"Getting back at her because she didn't want the ring." "So June didn't want to be engaged right now,
translation.ja: “一度 求婚して 断られても諦めるな”

translation.en: "and that freaks your mom out. Big deal!
translation.ja: “ママが怒っても 時機を待とう”って

translation.en: "What about all the things you and June wanted to do together, huh?"
translation.ja: “ママが怒っても 時機を待とう”って ２人の夢があったろ？

translation.en: Our list, you know?
translation.ja: ２人の夢があったろ？ 弟やシーラと バーモントでキャンプ

translation.en: Like camping in Vermont with my brother and Sheila in their new Winnie.
translation.ja: 弟やシーラと バーモントでキャンプ

translation.en: Tickets to Blue Man Group, the battlegrounds tour.
I wanna talk about the plane crash. Okay?
translation.ja: 墜落の話をさせて　いい？

translation.en: Sure, what about it?
I was on it. I mean, in it.
translation.ja: 乗ってたの あの飛行機に乗ってた

translation.en: I mean, I was in it.
translation.ja: あの飛行機に乗ってた

translation.en: So you were in the plane crash?
I wasn't supposed to be on that plane, but I was on it,
and there was this guy who was some sort of
translation.ja: スパイだか 何だかの 男が乗ってて―

translation.en: secret agent or something, and he...
translation.ja: スパイだか 何だかの 男が乗ってて― そいつが…

translation.en: He killed everybody on board.
And then he landed the plane. Next thing you know,
translation.ja: 飛行機は不時着… 私は薬を飲まされ 目覚めたら部屋にいた

translation.en: I wake up, I'm in my room. I have no idea how I got there.
translation.ja: 私は薬を飲まされ 目覚めたら部屋にいた

translation.en: He must've drugged me or something. Then I go to April's fitting, because I have to wear this ridiculous dress.
translation.ja: ドレスのサイズ合わせで 妹に会いに行くと―

translation.en: These other guys, these other agents come, they snatch me up.
translation.ja: 別のスパイが現れ― 私を拉致(らち)し カーチェイスになった

translation.en: Next thing you know, I'm in "Grand Theft Auto" on the I-93.
translation.ja: 私を拉致(らち)し カーチェイスになった なぜ手に触るの？

translation.en: Why are you touching my hand?
Because I'm here for you.
Jeez, you are so stressed out! Well, yeah! And I get it. Really?
translation.ja: 君は神経が参ってるんだよ

translation.en: I completely understand. I mean...
translation.ja: すごく よく分かる

translation.en: Wow, June. I know.
translation.ja: 大事な妹が結婚するんだから

translation.en: Your little sister's getting married... It's like...
translation.ja: 大事な妹が結婚するんだから 大変だよね

translation.en: ...and that is stressful. What are you talking about?
translation.ja: 何 言ってるの？ 話を聞いてた？

translation.en: You didn't even listen to what I was talking about.
translation.ja: 何 言ってるの？ 話を聞いてた？ 君の立場なら俺も そうなる

translation.en: No, I did. Look, I would probably be the same way in that situation.
translation.ja: 君の立場なら俺も そうなる 式の手伝いをしようか？

translation.en: What can I do to help? Setting up? We can bring the guys over...
translation.ja: 式の手伝いをしようか？ やだ　ウソ…

translation.en: Oh, Christ.
Hi, June. Look, I...
translation.ja: ジューン　すまない

translation.en: I'm sorry if I'm interrupting anything, but...
I'm Roy Miller.
Rodney Burris.
Rodney, hi. How are you?
We're running out of time, and maybe I didn't make it clear enough,
translation.ja: 時間がない 説明が足りなかった？

translation.en: but we're gonna have to stick together for a little bit, because of our...
translation.ja: 僕たちは離れちゃダメなんだ

translation.en: You know, our situation.
In case you didn't notice, Rodney is a fireman, okay?
So he's perfectly capable of handling any situation that comes up.
translation.ja: 何が起きようと 対処できるから―

translation.en: Thank you very much, you can leave us alone.
I have no doubt.
Ever since I was a little kid, I have great respect for firemen.
translation.ja: 子供の頃から 消防士を尊敬してる

translation.en: I don't think you guys get paid enough. Yeah, we don't.
translation.ja: 消防士の給料は安すぎる 確かに

translation.en: You're in Engine 10.
Yeah, Engine 10.
Yeah. Have you taken your lieutenant's exam yet?
I'm working on it.
Yeah? How's that going?
It's a bitch.
Did you ever do a tour in that hall, what is it?
translation.ja: 有名な分署があるよね

translation.en: Oh, Grove Hall, that's where the action is. It's the fastest way up the ladder.
translation.ja: “グローヴ･ホール” あそこに所属したい

translation.en: Rodney! House of Flames!
I often thought I...
I should have been a fireman.
(SOFTLY) Rodney, this is the guy.
translation.ja: ロドニー こいつよ

translation.en: This is the guy.
What? "This is the guy"?
I'm sorry, who are you?
I'm the guy?
I'm the guy. This is the guy. This is the guy.
This is the guy. I'm a guy.
I'm the guy. You are a guy.
I'm a guy. JUNE: He's the guy! He's the guy!
translation.ja: ロドニー　この人なのよ

translation.en: Rodney, whatever happens... God.
Please, for your own safety... Rodney, whatever happens,
you should know... ...please stay in the booth.
What are you talking about?
Everybody! Everybody get down.
translation.ja: みんな　床に伏せろ！

translation.en: Get down, down, down! Everybody down.
translation.ja: 伏せろ　さっさと伏せろ！

translation.en: Rodney, get down, or I will blow her head off.
translation.ja: ロドニー　伏せろ 女を撃つぞ

translation.en: I'll blow her head off.
(PATRONS SCREAMING) What did I say?
Rodney, what did I say?
Just calm down, buddy. Answer! Huh?
Sorry, I thought you were making a move.
translation.ja: ごめん　動いたかと

translation.en: Sorry. It's all right, I thought he was making a move.
translation.ja: 彼が動いたと思ったんだ

translation.en: Making a little pie. Pies for everybody. Everybody.
translation.ja: みんな　パイを食え アイスクリーム添えは 体に悪い

translation.en: Everybody gets pies, okay? No ice cream, a la mode.
translation.ja: アイスクリーム添えは 体に悪い

translation.en: Weakens the legs, people. Lincoln knew it. It's why they got to him.
translation.ja: リンカーンは知ってたから 殺された

translation.en: No one follows us, or I kill myself and then her.
translation.ja: 追ってくるな 自殺して 女を殺す

translation.en: Get in the car. Please. No.
Watch your head.
We're at 560 Harris. They're getting into a blue Volvo.
translation.ja: ハリス通り560 青いボルボ

translation.en: Rodney! Rodney! Rodney?
Oh, my God! Rodney!
It's okay. Look at me.
Okay. Look at me, it's okay. Shit!
I shot you through and through. No bone, nowhere near the femoral artery, okay? All right?
translation.ja: 損傷は肉だけ 骨も動脈も無事だ

translation.en: This is gonna be better for you than Grove Hall. It's all good.
Okay? You good? Good? Good.
Good?
There were four security cameras in that restaurant, June.
translation.ja: 店には防犯カメラが ４台あった

translation.en: Now there is proof you're my hostage.
translation.ja: 店には防犯カメラが ４台あった 拉致された様子が 記録されてるから―

translation.en: So we've cleared your name, with the locals, at least.
translation.ja: 拉致された様子が 記録されてるから―

translation.en: You know? It's a start. Something to build on.
translation.ja: 拉致された様子が 記録されてるから― 君の無実の証明になる

translation.en: You shot Rodney!
Yeah, I did.
But I asked him to stay in the booth.
You shot Rodney!
It might be the best thing that ever happened to him.
Yeah, right, because we all should get shot every now and then!
translation.ja: 撃たれると幸運なわけ？

translation.en: Rodney... Rodney is a good guy, June.
translation.ja: ロドニーは… いい奴だが

translation.en: But not really right for you.
translation.ja: いい奴だが 君には向かない 僕の意見だけどね

translation.en: I mean, you know, in my opinion. But a good guy.
translation.ja: 君には向かない 僕の意見だけどね

translation.en: Took a bullet, he's gonna be a hero. Probably get a promotion.
translation.ja: 撃たれて英雄になり 昇進できる

translation.en: Stop the car. Stop the car. What?
Stop the car. Stop the car. Stop the car. Just stop the car!
translation.ja: 止めて　止めて 車を止めて！

translation.en: June, I understand you want off the carousel.
I do, I wanna get off the carousel. Please, Roy. Can you stop the car, please? Right now!
translation.ja: もう うんざりなの 今すぐ車を止めて！

translation.en: I'm not one of those "I told you so" kind of guys, but I did warn you to stay off the plane last night.
translation.ja: 昨夜 警告したはずだよ あの便に乗るなって

translation.en: When?
Well, when I said, "Sometimes things happen for a reason."
translation.ja: “物事には理由がある”と 言っただろ

translation.en: That's not a warning. That's not a warning, Roy!
translation.ja: それ 警告？ どこが警告なのよ

translation.en: That's like a needlepoint expression or a bumper sticker.
translation.ja: はっきり分かるように 言ってよね

translation.en: Next time, try, "June, if you get on this plane, you will fucking die!"
translation.ja: “ジューン　この便に 乗ると死ぬよ”って

translation.en: Huh? You know, Roy, maybe they meant it when they said that I would be safe.
translation.ja: ＦＢＩといれば 安全だったかも

translation.en: You really mean that, June?
Did you feel safe with them?
translation.ja: 奴らといて安全だった？

translation.en: Safer than I do now!
Okay, okay. All right.
translation.ja: そうか　分かったよ

translation.en: Just so you understand,
right now, out there, on your own, your life expectancy is like here.
translation.ja: 僕がついてないと 君の寿命は ここ

translation.en: With me, it's here. Without me, here.
translation.ja: 僕とは ここ 僕なしは ここ

translation.en: With me, without me. With me, without me.
translation.ja: 僕と　僕なし 僕と　僕なし

translation.en: So...
I wouldn't advise going home. But, you know, it's up to you.
translation.ja: 一人で帰るかどうかは 君次第だ

translation.en: So right now I need another car, keep moving.
translation.ja: 僕は別の車で先を急ぐ

translation.en: Someone else is depending on me. Someone whose life is in danger.
translation.ja: 僕を信じてる奴の命が 危ないんだ

translation.en: Someone who trusts me. Every second I waste chasing you,
translation.ja: 僕を信じてる奴の命が 危ないんだ 君といるより 彼を守らないと

translation.en: I'm letting him down.
translation.ja: 君といるより 彼を守らないと

translation.en: WOMAN ON TV: Rodney, why did you make this brave call to leap into action?
translation.ja: ロドニー　とても勇敢な 行動ですね

translation.en: RODNEY ON TV: Well, I didn't think.
translation.ja: ロドニー　とても勇敢な 行動ですね 何も考えず 体が動いてたんです

translation.en: I just did what any man would do in that situation, you know?
translation.ja: 何も考えず 体が動いてたんです

translation.en: I leapt into action. Thanks. Like you said, it's really the job.
translation.ja: 人を救うのが 僕の仕事ですから

translation.en: You should be so proud. Thanks. Good job.
It really didn't even hurt. It was kind of like a bee sting.
What a brave firefighter. The doctors tell me Rodney is going to be okay, just a flesh wound.
translation.ja: 勇敢な消防士です 弾は骨と動脈をそれました

translation.en: A true blue Boston hero. Back to you, Don.
translation.ja: 彼こそボストンの英雄です

translation.en: That, right there, is what everybody wants.
translation.ja: これだよ 誰もが必死で狙ってる

translation.en: A Burger King toy?
Open it up.
It's warm. What is it?
A battery.
A battery?
It's code-named Zephyr. Not your average Duracell.
translation.ja: 暗号名は“ゼファー” 画期的だ

translation.en: It's high output. Never runs out.
translation.ja: パワーが強く 消耗しない

translation.en: What do you mean, "never"?
That little thing there is the first perpetual energy source since the sun.
translation.ja: 小さいけど 世界初の “永久エネルギー”だよ

translation.en: So, what, your flashlight never runs out of juice?
translation.ja: 懐中電灯を永久に使えるの？

translation.en: It can power a lot more than a flashlight, June.
Really? How much more? Mmm.
translation.ja: ほんと？ どのくらい？

translation.en: Small city.
Large submarine.
It's big.
The guy who invented it is barely out of high school.
translation.ja: 発明者は まだ 高校を出たばかり

translation.en: Simon Feck.
I was assigned with another agent to watch him at a facility, a lab in Wichita.
translation.ja: 僕は同僚とウィチタのラボで 彼を警護してた

translation.en: And the other guy, the agent, is the guy who picked you up this morning.
translation.ja: その同僚とは 今朝 君を拉致した男だ

translation.en: Fitzgerald.
A couple of weeks ago, I found out he was going to sell the battery
translation.ja: ２週間前 分かった フィッツが電池を売り サイモンを殺す気だと

translation.en: and kill Simon.
translation.ja: フィッツが電池を売り サイモンを殺す気だと

translation.en: So I got Simon out of there,
put him someplace safe and went back for the battery.
translation.ja: 隠れ家に移し 電池を取りに戻った

translation.en: Fitz set me up. Made it look like I went rogue.
translation.ja: だが フィッツの 罠にはまり― 裏切り者にされた

translation.en: That's when I met you.
So...
So, what's next? I mean, what's the plan?
translation.ja: 次は どうするの？ プランは？

translation.en: I think we get some rest,
pick up Simon, and get you back for your sister's wedding.
translation.ja: サイモンを迎えに行き 君を妹の式へ

translation.en: I'm pretty good at what I do, June.
translation.ja: 僕は優秀なエージェントだ

translation.en: And tonight, we're safe.
Scout's honor.
translation.ja: ボーイスカウトが誓う

translation.en: Safe and secure?
Good night, Roy.
Were you really a Boy Scout?
translation.ja: ボーイスカウトだったの？

translation.en: Eagle Scout.
I was a Brownie.
That's cool. Mmm.
(WHISPERS) Good night, Roy.
MILLER: Pies for everybody. Everybody. Everybody gets pies, okay? No ice cream...
translation.ja: みんな　パイを食え アイスクリーム添えは…

translation.en: So, what do you think? Are we looking at another player?
translation.ja: どう思う？ この女も仲間？

translation.en: We're looking at a pawn. I talked to her, so did he.
translation.ja: ただの人質です 話をしました

translation.en: She owns a garage, no passport, gone nowhere, been nowhere.
translation.ja: 修理工場を経営 ずっと あの街に

translation.en: She's a nobody.
You've been two steps behind since this began, Fitz.
translation.ja: ミラーを取り逃がしてばかり

translation.en: Are you sure someone is not taking you to school?
translation.ja: あなたに任せて大丈夫？

translation.en: Clean this shit up.
This is a safe house?
Simon!
Simon?
Stay close.
Hey, Simon, this is no time to play.
translation.ja: サイモン 隠れんぼか？

translation.en: What is all this?
Simon. It's what he does.
I'm late, and he's gone.
translation.ja: 僕が遅れ 彼は消えた

translation.en: ♪ Don't lie when you're hurting inside
(SOFTLY) Simon.
♪ Why you try to put up a front for me
Hmm. "Made in Austria."
Who are these people? Are they Fitzgerald's guys?
translation.ja: こいつら何者？ フィッツの仲間？

translation.en: No, it's other guys.
translation.ja: いや　別の組織だな

translation.en: Other bad guys?
Worse guys. Hold my mags.
translation.ja: より危険だ 持ってろ

translation.en: Worse guys?
Now, I need you to listen carefully. Do exactly as I say.
translation.ja: よく聞いて 言うとおりにしろ

translation.en: On three, I'm gonna lay down cover,
then we're gonna run to those shelves over there. Okay.
translation.ja: そして あの棚の裏へ

translation.en: You ready? Yeah.
One...
Sorry. I panicked.
translation.ja: ごめん　パニクった

translation.en: What number would you like?
Let's just stick with three, it's good.
Okay. One... Two...
Three.
These guys are fancy. Mags.
translation.ja: ヤバい連中だ マガジン

translation.en: Could be Antonio Quintana's men.
translation.ja: アントニオの手下だな

translation.en: He's a Spanish arms dealer.
translation.ja: スペインの武器商人で―

translation.en: He also wants the battery.
Ready? Uh-huh.
Let's move. Okay.
June. June!
How the hell are we gonna get out of here?
translation.ja: どうやって ここから 逃げるの？

translation.en: And where the hell is Simon?
I don't know yet, but he left a message.
A message? Wait.
What I need you to do right now is wait here.
translation.ja: 君は ここで待っててくれ

translation.en: What? Yeah. I'm gonna find us a way out.
I can't wait here! I'll be right back.
translation.ja: 逃げ道を探してくる 待って　ロイ

translation.en: Wait! Roy!
Just take this.
(WHISPERING) Roy?
June?
(SCREAMING) June! June! June! June!
June!
Please stop saying my name. You keep saying my name, it's freaking me out.
translation.ja: 名前 何度も呼ばれると パニクる

translation.en: Okay. I understand. Okay.
translation.ja: 分かった　悪かった

translation.en: Drink this. What is it?
Brotine-zero. They're gonna smoke us with D-5.
translation.ja: ブロタイン･ゼロ 毒ガスの中和剤

translation.en: Where's yours?
Oh, shit.
I'm sorry. Oh, no. They're coming.
translation.ja: ごめん　奴らが来る

translation.en: (WHISPERING) June.
I know this looks bad,
but we'll be out of here
in a couple of minutes. I got this.
translation.ja: 今すぐに 待ってろ

translation.en: We gotta go, June. Here, I'll help you.
translation.ja: さあ　行くぞ おいで

translation.en: (SHOUTING) We've been hit!
But it's okay!
We get through this, we're home free!
Ready, set, go!
We're almost there.
Hey, there, sleepy head.
How long have I been out?
Eighteen hours.
Where am I?
My place.
We're off-grid. No one's ever found me here.
translation.ja: 地図にない島 誰にも見つからない

translation.en: Shame we can't stay longer. We got a rendezvous with Simon.
translation.ja: でも すぐ サイモンを迎えに

translation.en: He's fine. I figured out his code.
translation.ja: 暗号を解いた　彼は無事だ

translation.en: He's crazy about trains. He used the passport I gave him and went to Austria.
translation.ja: 鉄道マニアだから オーストリアへ行った

translation.en: You drugged me again, Roy.
Yeah.
You can't do that.
Well, you weren't coping well.
I'm not sure, if you were awake, if they would've even let you live.
translation.ja: 眠らせなかったら 殺されてたかも

translation.en: What am I wearing?
A bikini. We're in the tropics.
translation.ja: ビキニ　南の島だぞ

translation.en: How did I get in the bikini?
June, I've been trained to dismantle a bomb in the pitch black
translation.ja: 僕は訓練を受け 真っ暗闇でも― 安全ピンとチョコだけで 爆弾を解体できる

translation.en: with nothing but a safety pin and a Junior Mint.
translation.ja: 安全ピンとチョコだけで 爆弾を解体できる

translation.en: I think I can get you in and out of some clothes without
